title: Agentic AI for Cyber Resilience: A New Security Paradigm and Its System-Theoretic Foundations
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: Cybersecurity is being fundamentally reshaped by foundation-model-based artificial intelligence. Large language models now enable autonomous planning, tool orchestration, and strategic adaptation at scale, challenging security architectures built on static rules, perimeter defenses, and human-center
